extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • moveBy

        public void moveBy(double dx,
          double dy,
          double dz)
        Translates the robot in the three-dimensional space by the specified offsets along the X, Y and Z axes.
        Parameters:
        dx - The offset along the X axis.
        dy - The offset along the Y axis.
        dz - The offset along the Z axis.

      • rotateBy

        public void rotateBy(double x,
            double y,
            double z,
            double da)
        Rotates the robot in the three-dimensional space about the specified axis and by the specified angle offset. The rotation axis is specified by three X, Y and Z coordinates which are used internally to create a rotation matrix that transforms the robot. The specified (x, y, z) vector must be a unit-length vector.
        Parameters:
        x - The X component of a unit-length vector representing the rotation axis.
        y - The Y component of a unit-length vector representing the rotation axis.
        z - The Z component of a unit-length vector representing the rotation axis.
        da - The angular offset.
